dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and now the Minister of Ecology, Yerlan Nyssanbayev, is saying saiga meat will actually be sold in stores across Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and now the Minister of Ecology, Yerlan Nyssanbayev, is saying saiga meat will actually be sold in stores across Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Minister of Ecology Yerlan Nyssanbayev announced that saiga meat will soon be available in retail stores across Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, really? After those mass die-offs last year? That's… surprising.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, really? After those mass die-offs last year? That's... surprising.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, he mentioned the 2023 experience, said they're taking it seriously this time—vet checks, certified plants, all that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, he mentioned the twenty twenty three experience, said they're taking it seriously this time-vet checks, certified plants, all that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "Taking into account the difficult experience of 2023, we approached this matter very seriously. If we proceed with population control, it will be exclusively through certified meat plants, where each carcass will undergo sanitary and veterinary procedures to ensure public safety," Nyssanbayev said at a Senate meeting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But didn't we just hear about another 16,800 saigas dead in Ulytau? Like, from disease?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But didn't we just hear about another sixteen thousand, eight hundred saigas dead in Ulytau? Like, from disease?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 2, Zhanibek Nupirov, Deputy Akim of the Ulytau region, reported 16,800 saiga deaths, warning that the situation poses a risk of disease outbreaks in the area.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, it's uh, kind of alarming timing. Social media's already outraged over the footage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, it's uh, kind of alarming timing. Social media's already outraged over the footage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shocking footage of saiga deaths sparks outrage on Kazakh social media

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he's talking about processing up to 3,700 saigas a day? Through 13 different enterprises?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he's talking about processing up to three thousand, seven hundred saigas a day? Through thirteen different enterprises?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nyssanbayev also outlined plans for the processing and sale of saiga meat, noting that 13 enterprises are prepared to receive up to 3,700 saigas daily.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, in regions like West Kazakhstan, Atyrau, Aktobe… places where saigas are common.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, in regions like West Kazakhstan, Atyrau, Aktobe... places where saigas are common.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These plants are located in regions where saigas are commonly found " including West Kazakhstan, Atyrau, Aktobe, Akmola, Kostanay, Karaganda, and Pavlodar regions," the minister noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But if the population's still vulnerable, isn't this risky? I mean, they haven't even finished the field research to count them properly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But if the population's still vulnerable, isn't this risky? I mean, they haven't even finished the field research to count them properly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the minister, the exact size of the saiga population will be determined after field research.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's the thing—he said the exact population size isn't confirmed yet. They're planning ahead anyway.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the thing-he said the exact population size isn't confirmed yet. They're planning ahead anyway.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the minister, the exact size of the saiga population will be determined after field research.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And businesses are already interested in building new facilities? It feels like they're moving really fast.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And businesses are already interested in building new facilities? It feels like they're moving really fast.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "There is business interest in building new storage and processing facilities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Public safety's the priority, he says, but after last year, you'd think caution would be top of mind.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Public safety's the priority, he says, but after last year, you'd think caution would be top of mind.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If we proceed with population control, it will be exclusively through certified meat plants, where each carcass will undergo sanitary and veterinary procedures to ensure public safety," Nyssanbayev said at a Senate meeting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Those images of dead saigas… hard to shake.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Those images of dead saigas... hard to shake.
